Articles.Content:
Here's my attempt at recreating the solar powered plane Solar Impulse. The Solar Flyer is good and slow but can't really fly at night. It is graceful like a slow butterfly but don't expect andy stunts with it. Also I may have accidently added a bunch of ore tanks behind the command pod so take all of those out.  Happy flying.

Full album https://imgur.com/a/sD15Aea

Spoiler

KerbalX link:https://kerbalx.com/spaceyfacey/Solar-Flyer

Action Groups:
[1] Toggles Motor Direction
[2] Toggles Flaps
[3] Toggles Motor Power
[4] Toggles Cockpit Lights

(Photo credits, Xenome)

And the flaps and control surfaces were deleted by kerbalx so when you download you have to switch them on by hand.
